name: Daily Deal Pros
tag_list: daily-deals, daily-deal-software, daily-deal-platform, daily-deal-whitelabel, daily-deal-software-platform, whitelabel-software, affiliate-marketing, deal-of-the-day-sites, offer-of-the-day-sites
overview:
Daily Deal Pros, Inc provides white label daily deal software to Publishers around the world who wish to operate their own deal/offer of the day sites.

Daily Deal Pros is also affiliate based, meaning that once you have an account with Daily Deal Pros, you’re able to create an unlimited number of additional, private label sites, and brand them as you see fit. Many Publishers use affiliate based marketing to brand school, sports teams/organizations, groups, causes, charities, radio stations and newspapers.

A complete line of administrative tools provide countless options for configurations for each and every site on the Daily Deal Pros, Inc network.
